page.title: 06Developments in Plym.St.M.
page.content: There is a new{industrial estate being constructed in the area.The site manager enjoys the work earning about Â£12,500 p.a.He is allowed a company car.He has been based in Plymouth for 8yrs but may be moved anywhere for his next job. There is one factory under construction but two more are planned. The finished building will cost about Â£400,000 and cover about 3 acres.The factory is possibly for an{American } firm to make{microchips}using local labour for the work. The manager feels that he is building on{good agricultural land}and that if possible the factory should have been built in Plymouth. The construction was started on 29th April and should be finished by 28th Oct.,or else a penalty will be incurred.
